summary: Hi There I want to give this mod
descriptionHtml:
if you don\'t want to load with casualmods.net you come to the right place
Test Dance Sync for TES5.

Installation.
Unpack archive into the game folder. At launcher choose IllDanceForYouEng.esp or IllDanceForYouRus.esp

How to using.

Ask any NPC to dance with you. 

Bugs.
NPC to which you applied is the music source, it may just give up and leave you with sound, nor the fact that he will dance with you.
My dance animation is changing of original npc_applauds2.hkx. At this times it\'s impossible to add custom anims into game by CK.

Used animation Galaxias!

How to using video.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NPJiYeeCuEw

Credits:
Arakabu - for MMD to TES4 exporter.
Umpa - for TES4 conversion of this dance.
Come if you want this is mod for you here in nexus
author: For you And Skyrim
